name: Lost In the Dark (Turtle Speed)
description:
This game was developed has part of the 2021 Global Game Jam,

You'll have a giant spider hunting you down since the start of the game, can you outrun it while collecting all the fire flies?

Team:

  • Ana Franco (Artist);
  • Catarina Aguiar (Artist);
  • Edgar Canelas (Sound designer);
  • Ivo Vieira (Programmer);
  • Pedro Cabral (Programmer).

Tools:

  • Unity;
  • Fmod;
  • Spriter.
